TopicTitle: 3 Great Ideas for things to add in ksp.

Articles.Content:
1 Easier to install mods/add-ons

2 Female kerbals.

3 MULTIPLAYER!!!

Thank you for looking at my ideas, I hope they go in the game bye!

2 & 3 have already been confirmed and are on the what not to suggest list. #1, I don't really see how it'd be easier than copying a folder into another? Anyways last I heard some integration with Curse was planned for ingame mod installs, so I'll consider that planned as well.

Thread closed
